name: Free Range
description:
You are the mother Hen on a family farm and dream of one thing... to live the life of a free range chicken. There is just one thing, you have to hatch all your eggs before you can make a run for it. 

Be sure to hatch your eggs before the humans take them and bring them to your coup to save them before becoming true free range chickens!

Controls:

- WASD or Arrows to Move

- Space to Dash

- E to BUCK-AW

- Stand over the eggs to hatch

- Walk the hatched eggs to your safe coup
